code: import _objectSpread from"/home/henrique_yasuo/Documents/AllBertinho/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import produce from'immer';import{toast}from'react-toastify';export default function cart(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_PRODUCTS_TO_CART_SUCCESS':return produce(state,function(draft){console.log(action);draft.push(_objectSpread({},action.products));});case'REMOVE_PRODUCTS_TO_CART':return produce(state,function(draft){var productsIndex=draft.findIndex(function(t){return t.id===action.id;});if(productsIndex>=0){draft.splice(productsIndex,1);}});default:return state;}}
